parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: The ID of the task. You can specify multiple task IDs at a time to modify the switching time of the tasks in a unified manner. The task IDs must be separated with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~98041~~) operation to query the region ID details.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SwitchTime
parameters.description: The time that you specify for the background to perform the action that corresponds to the pending event. Specify the time in the `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` format. The time must be in UTC.
